name: DumbCharades
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dumb charades
des:
The ever classic game of Charades is now on Alexa. 
Split into teams and pick a player to go first. And then say "Alexa, open Dumb Charades" or "Alexa, ask dumb charades for a hollywood movie"
Alexa will then whisper the movie name (ask everyone else to cover their ears!). 
You can also set a acting and guessing timer of 2 minutes. When Prompted, just say "Start the timer" and alexa will set the timer for 2 minutes.

P.S - Right now you cannot change the duration of the timer. It will be available in a later version.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
